programme.title: Deep Undercover
programme.desc: FBI agent infiltrates the mob that controls gambling and drugs in New England; NJ deputy opens an illegal betting club to snare local wise guys; Missouri Highway Patrol enters the world of dogfighting to break its back and save the animals.

programme.title: Deep Undercover
programme.desc: Houston cops Cliff Manning and Scott Davis go undercover to infiltrate a group of dog fighters by opening a dog pen club with hidden audio and video cameras to get evidence on everyone who attends their events.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A dedicated mother disappears from suburban Los Angeles, leaving behind three kids and a husband she planned to divorce; law enforcement determines she's been the victim of a homicide but it takes them nearly two decades to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A homicide involving a teenage daughter and her boyfriend who can't get out from underneath a mother's overbearing eye; once cops unravel the twisted web of lies, they uncover the shocking truth behind a premeditated murder plot.
